content:
chore: adaptations for nightly-2025-03-24 #23279

Please review this PR. At the end of the month this diff will land in 'master'.

This looks OK to me but a lot of it is well beyond my comfort zone, in particular this change from mkArray to replicate, so I'm slightly reluctant to merge it myself (often I do with these, but here I feel like I am not competent).

There were a few changes from #23130 that were overwritten by a bad merge somewhere along the line. I've fixed these in https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/23279/commits/df3493d2757c121b309a37ac0251c397c558e973, which I'll cherry-pick back to nightly-testing now.
Oops, that bad merge was me getting confused about what git considered was "incoming" and what was "outgoing" in the script.
